info.title: The Ubirch web admin API
info.description: Docs for the Ubirch web admin API

get.description: Simple check to see if the service is up
Authenticate a device against Ubirch device management system. Returns a token if valid, HTTP error code 401 if not

parameters.name: X-Ubirch-Hardware-Id
parameters.description: HardwareId of the device

parameters.name: X-Ubirch-Credential
parameters.description: Password of the device, base64 encoded

get.summary: Get the info of a device
get.description: Get general information about a device.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the device. The token can be obtained from the /auth endpoint. Should follow the syntax "bearer TOKEN

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

requestBody.description: List of device representation to add [{hwDeviceId: String, description: String, deviceType: String, listGroups: List[String]}].

get.summary: List all the devices of one user
get.description: For the moment does not support pagination

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of the page requested (starts at 0)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of devices to be contained in a page

get.summary: Search for devices matching a specific attribute
get.description: Search for devices matching a specific attribute: description, hwDeviceId, ...

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: String that will be used for the search

post.summary: Number of UPPs that the specified devices created during the specified timeframe
post.description: Number of UPPs that the specified devices created during the specified timeframe

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Date in Joda time

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Date in Joda time

get.description: Get one device belonging to a user from his hwDeviceId

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: hwDeviceId of the device

put.description: Update a device. The specified device will see all its attributes replaced by the new provided one.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: hwDeviceId of the device that will be updated

delete.description: Delete one device belonging to a user from his hwDeviceId

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: hwDeviceId of the device that will be deleted

get.summary: Get all the groups of a user

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

delete.description: Delete a group that the user controls.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group

put.summary: Add a device into a group
put.description: Add a device into a group. Can only be done if the user is the owner of the device

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group

parameters.name: hwDeviceIds
parameters.description: HwDeviceIds of the device to be added on the group

get.summary: Get all the devices of a group

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group

get.summary: Check if a group is empty.
get.description: Check if a group is empty.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group

post.summary: Make a user leave a group.
post.description: Make a user leave a group.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group

get.summary: Get all the users of a group

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group

post.summary: Create a group and add the user in it

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: Name of the group

get.summary: Get a user from its Token

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

get.description: Get a user's basic info: number of devices and last login

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Token of the user. ADD "bearer " followed by a space) BEFORE THE TOKEN OTHERWISE IT WON'T WORK

get.summary: Get a user from its username and realm

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user

parameters.name: realmName
parameters.description: Name of the realm where the user is
